{!-- ============================================================================= Archive ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– - Displays a list of the blog posts organised by category - Static cached ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Resource Router globals: {pg_cat_id}, {pg_title}, {pg_subtitle}, {pg_img} ============================================================================= --} {!-- include the base layout --} {stash:embed:layouts:base} {!-- block:content --} {exp:stash:extend name="block:content" with="partials:archive_list replace='y'"} {!-- capture entry data for {pg_entry_id} --} {stash:embed:models:post_model process="start" parse="no"} {!-- static caching for page 1 of results only --} {!-- {exp:stash:static logged_out_only="yes" compress="yes"}--}
